file_content.text: You harness immense power--but you lack the purity of will to direct it.
I will not be contained. I cannot be redeemed. Death is all that remains, and you will not kill me.
There are worse things than death. I'll make sure you experience all of them.
I'll see that you suffer.
Pettiness, fueled by self-righteousness. You are the same as my slaves.
I don't want to kill you--but you will face justice for your crimes.
I am a Jedi.
There is no justice. There is only revenge.
I will open your eyes to the Jedi way. I'm taking you to Tython.
You can be redeemed.
You clutch at your old Master's ambitions and ignore your true desires.
It's over, Lord Scourge. The Emperor is defeated.
But I felt nothing... you haven't killed him. Strike! Do it now!
I will not be your trophy. If I must die, I choose how--and everything dies with me.
You've underestimated me for the last time.
Wrong. [Kill the Emperor]
It's finished, Lord Scourge. I killed the Emperor.
I can sense him fading... but he is not gone.
If I must die, everything dies with me.
The temple is coming apart! We have to leave! Get back to your ship!
The circle closes. The end begins.
You dissipated your energy saving the weak. There are consequences.
You sacrifice your friends to this confrontation, hoping for advantage. You have gained little.
My life spans millennia. Legions have risen to test me.
You're a threat to every living being in the galaxy. If you won't surrender, I will destroy you.
This is no test.
You are a blind insect, contemplating the void of space.
If you kill everyone in the galaxy, you'll be the Emperor of nothing. What's the point of all this?
Why are you doing this?
You discern a fraction of reality. Beyond these stars exist other galaxies, other worlds, other beings.
I will experience or ignore them as I wish. I will spend eternity becoming everything: a farmer, an artist, a simple man.
When the last living thing in the universe finally dies, I will enjoy peace and wait for the cycle to begin again.
You will never possess that kind of power.
That's impossible.
There is no death; there is only the Force--and I am its master.
I've saved every world you tried to destroy. You can't win.
Your madness ends here.
My ascendance is inevitable. A day, a year, a millennium--it matters not. I hold the patience of stone and the will of stars.
Your striving is insignificant. Let your death be the same.
Thank you, Emperor. You removed all doubt that you need to die.
No, you won't. [Attack]
You've been a blight on this galaxy long enough. Time for you to burn.
Die, Sith. [Attack]
